00056 void CReadWindow::setDisplayWidget( CReadDisplay* newDisplay ){
00057 //  qWarning("CReadWindow::setDisplayWidget()");    
00058     if (m_displayWidget) {
00059     disconnect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceClicked(const QString&, const QString&)), this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&, const QString&)));
00060     disconnect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceDropped(const QString&)), this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&)));
00061   }
00062 
00063     m_displayWidget = newDisplay;
00064   connect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceClicked(const QString&, const QString&)),this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&, const QString&)));
00065   connect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceDropped(const QString&)), this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&)));
00066 }

00069 void CReadWindow::lookup( CSwordKey* newKey ){
00070     qWarning("CReadWindow::lookup");
00071     setUpdatesEnabled(false);   
00072     
00073     if (!key())
00074         return;
00075     backend()->setFilterOptions( filterOptions() );
00076     backend()->setDisplayOptions( displayOptions() );
00077 
00078     SWKey* swKey = dynamic_cast<SWKey*>(key());
00079     if (swKey && modules().first()->getDisplay()) { //do we have a display object?
00080         modules().first()->module()->SetKey(*swKey);
00081         if (modules().count() > 1)  //we want to display more than one module
00082             modules().first()->getDisplay()->Display( &modules() );
00083         else
00084             modules().first()->getDisplay()->Display( modules().first() );
00085         displayWidget()->setText(modules().first()->getDisplay()->getHTML());
00086     }   
00087     if (key() != newKey)
00088         key()->key(newKey->key());
00089         
00090     setUpdatesEnabled(true);
00091     setCaption( windowCaption() );
00092 }

00121 void CReadWindow::storeProfileSettings(CProfileWindow * const settings){
00122     QRect rect;
00123     rect.setX(parentWidget()->x());
00124     rect.setY(parentWidget()->y());
00125     rect.setWidth(width());
00126     rect.setHeight(height());
00127     settings->setGeometry(rect);
00128         
00129 //  settings->setScrollbarPositions( m_htmlWidget->view()->horizontalScrollBar()->value(), m_htmlWidget->view()->verticalScrollBar()->value() );
00130     settings->setType(modules().first()->type());
00131     settings->setMaximized(isMaximized() || parentWidget()->isMaximized());
00132     
00133     if (key()) {
00134         VerseKey* vk = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(key());
00135         QString oldLang;
00136         if (vk) {
00137              oldLang = QString::fromLatin1(vk->getLocale());    
00138             vk->setLocale("en"); //save english locale names as default!        
00139         }
00140         settings->setKey( key()->key() );
00141         if (vk) {
00142             vk->setLocale(oldLang.latin1());
00143         }
00144     }
00145         
00146     QStringList mods;
00147     for (CSwordModuleInfo* m = modules().first(); m; m = modules().next()) {
00148         mods.append(m->name());
00149     }   
00150     settings->setModules(mods);
00151 }
